known_issues: PDF display issue persists after version 40 deployment

existing_features.title: Investigate and diagnose why PDF attachments in approved application statuses are not displaying correctly despite previous attempts to fix the issue in versions 39-40
Fix the PdfAttachmentSection component to reliably display approved application PDFs by ensuring blob URLs are correctly generated from valid PDF bytes and iframes can render them
Add comprehensive error logging to track the complete PDF data flow from backend retrieval through blob URL creation to iframe rendering, including validation results at each step

new_feature_requests.summary: Ensure that when an application status is approved, the PDF attachment bytes stored in the backend are valid and complete PDF data

projectName: Fix persistent PDF display issue in approved applications
